page.title: 13BOARD GAMES
page.content: You play board games when it is the winter or you are bored or when visitors come.A board game is a game you play using a board.Two of the most popular board games are{Monopoly}and {Snakes and ladders.}The idea of{Snakes {and ladders}is to get from 0 to 100.If you land on a snakes head you have to go back to a lower number. If you land on the bottom of a ladder you go to a higher number.You throw one die with 1 to 6 on it and move the number it shows.It is for 2 to 4 players. {Monopoly}is a game also for 2 to 4 players. You pick a counter,throw two dice then move your counter the number you have thrown.Monopoly is a game of business you buy land and build on it.If your opponent lands on your land he has to pay rent.
